name: Squared In
description:
Try and get to your circular partner as you change shapes to get through doors!

XanderJam THEME: Opposites Attract

How the game fits in: The game revolves around the male square to get to the female circle. Not only does the male need to get to the female. (Male, Female: Opposites) but also Squares and Circles seem like opposites at least in my mind.

GeoJam THEME: Switch

In the game to get through certain doors you have to "switch" your shape so that you can get to the end of the level.

I'll have a devlog soon on my channel so look out for that!
